Uses of Class
Control

    • Uses of Control in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of Control in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KeyboardControl
      This class extends the Control class which has the functions that returns the keys pressed has all the basic controls DONE TO DO there should only be one keyboard if there are more add an exception (or do something) NOTES you need to addKeyListener to this class to use it
      class  PS3Control
      this class extends Control class to manage the buttons easily that can be used in the game NOTE Done To do Avoid having players with the same control add the ability to use the other buttons (Although that should depend on the game.) it still will assume at least one controller exist it will give an error if its null
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return types with arguments of type Control 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Vector<Control> ControlManager.getAllControls()
      this method populates the vector for all controls
